description: The Weilert Family PGA Scholarship was created for a student pursuing a PGA Golf Management degree. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Must be a PGA Management Student. GPA 2.75 or higher 30 hours completed at UCO. Completed 1 internship. This scholarship is available to apply for during the current UCO student application period.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
